topic.title: Can I configure the quota?
topic.body:
I do not want my hard drive capacity exhausted just for the growing web data. So, I want to set the quota and/or expire date. And, the web data could be stored in part, not all, of the peers who had accessed the web by some conditions, such as locations, quota, or etc.
Although the content zeronet have still doesn't bother me, but one day, maybe I would need to delete some data by hand.

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: 中文, にほんご, and English 都是 OK 的.

1_1Fc6nJa6MrdecVhDna6JvHetoQce4aigBz.body:
あいうえお
龍龖龘𪚥
